Package com.atakmap.android.favorites

Class FavoriteListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.atakmap.android.favorites.FavoriteListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    public class FavoriteListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Adapter for the favorite list supplied as part of the Maps and Favorites drop down. Contains the adapter as well as the parsing code responsible for ingesting the favs.txt file.
